violations.description: Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
violations.help: Frames must have an accessible name

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has no title attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

violations.description: Elements marked as presentational should not have global ARIA or tabindex to ensure all screen readers ignore them
violations.help: Ensure elements marked as presentational are consistently ignored

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Element is not focusable.

violations.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
violations.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks
